segments.text: Hello . My name ’ s Linda Brown . What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . I ’ m Tom Peterson . I ’ m looking for a one-bedroom apartment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . First , I would like to ask you some questions to identify your needs before I show you what we have .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What price range are you interested in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . Do you have a special location in mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d like to live somewhere near the university , or at least on a bus line .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When would you like to move in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about the end of this month ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are there any special features that you would like to have , such as , a dishwasher , a balcony , a swimming pool , central air conditionining , etc . ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to have a dishwasher and central air conditioning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . Here are the photos of the apartments that fit your preferences .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . This one looks nice . Is it near the university ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . It ’ s only 5 minutes walk from the campus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s good . I ’ d like to see it .
segments.speaker: S2
